ModMetaData.name: Co-Love Relations
ModMetaData.author: Luke_lu
ModMetaData.description: Modified from [SIC] Co-Spousal Relations. Adds an implied relationship between people in Love to the same person, which removes the mood penalty for sharing a bed so long as their mutual Lover is present. It also allows Co-Lover. Also changes the way that beds are sorted in order to make pawns actually sleep as close to their partners as possible when sharing larger beds.
